input: Who scored the most total points this season?

metadata.sql_query: SELECT p.first_name || ' ' || p.last_name AS player, SUM(pgs.points) AS total_points FROM player_game_stats pgs JOIN players p ON pgs.player_id = p.player_id GROUP BY pgs.player_id ORDER BY total_points DESC LIMIT 1

input: Which team has the most wins this season?

metadata.sql_query: SELECT t.name, COUNT(*) AS wins FROM games g JOIN teams t ON ((g.home_score > g.away_score AND g.home_team_id = t.team_id) OR (g.away_score > g.home_score AND g.away_team_id = t.team_id)) GROUP BY t.team_id ORDER BY wins DESC LIMIT 1

input: What is the average team score per game this season?
What was the highest individual point total in a single game this season?

metadata.sql_query: SELECT p.first_name || ' ' || p.last_name AS player, pgs.points FROM player_game_stats pgs JOIN players p ON pgs.player_id = p.player_id ORDER BY pgs.points DESC LIMIT 1

input: How many games went to overtime this season?

metadata.sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM games WHERE overtime_periods > 0

input: Which team has the best field goal percentage this season?

metadata.sql_query: SELECT t.name, ROUND(AVG(tgs.fg_percentage), 3) AS avg_fg FROM team_game_stats tgs JOIN teams t ON tgs.team_id = t.team_id GROUP BY tgs.team_id ORDER BY avg_fg DESC LIMIT 1

input: Which player averages the most assists per game this season (minimum 10 games played)?

metadata.sql_query: SELECT p.first_name || ' ' || p.last_name AS player, ROUND(AVG(pgs.assists), 2) AS avg_ast FROM player_game_stats pgs JOIN players p ON pgs.player_id = p.player_id GROUP BY pgs.player_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 10 ORDER BY avg_ast DESC LIMIT 1

input: How many total games have been played in the 2024-25 season?
Which conference has more wins this season?

metadata.sql_query: SELECT t.conference, COUNT(*) AS wins FROM games g JOIN teams t ON ((g.home_score > g.away_score AND g.home_team_id = t.team_id) OR (g.away_score > g.home_score AND g.away_team_id = t.team_id)) GROUP BY t.conference ORDER BY wins DESC LIMIT 1

input: Which player averages the most rebounds per game this season (minimum 10 games played)?

metadata.sql_query: SELECT p.first_name || ' ' || p.last_name AS player, ROUND(AVG(pgs.rebounds), 2) AS avg_reb FROM player_game_stats pgs JOIN players p ON pgs.player_id = p.player_id GROUP BY pgs.player_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 10 ORDER BY avg_reb DESC LIMIT 1

input: How many players are in the 2024-25 season database?
Which team plays in the Northwest division of the Western conference?

metadata.sql_query: SELECT name FROM teams WHERE conference = 'Western' AND division = 'Northwest' ORDER BY name

input: Which player recorded the most double-doubles (at least 10 points AND at least 10 rebounds in the same game) this season?

metadata.sql_query: SELECT p.first_name || ' ' || p.last_name AS player, COUNT(*) AS double_doubles FROM player_game_stats pgs JOIN players p ON pgs.player_id = p.player_id WHERE pgs.points >= 10 AND pgs.rebounds >= 10 GROUP BY pgs.player_id ORDER BY double_doubles DESC LIMIT 1

input: Which team has the biggest positive difference between their home wins and away wins this season?

metadata.sql_query: WITH home_wins AS (SELECT home_team_id AS team_id, COUNT(*) AS wins FROM games WHERE home_score > away_score GROUP BY home_team_id), away_wins AS (SELECT away_team_id AS team_id, COUNT(*) AS wins FROM games WHERE away_score > home_score GROUP BY away_team_id) SELECT t.name, hw.wins AS home_wins, aw.wins AS away_wins, (hw.wins - aw.wins) AS diff FROM home_wins hw JOIN away_wins aw ON hw.team_id = aw.team_id JOIN teams t ON hw.team_id = t.team_id ORDER BY diff DESC LIMIT 1

input: Which player has the highest true shooting percentage this season among players with at least 10 games played and at least 5 field goal attempts per game on average?

metadata.sql_query: SELECT p.first_name || ' ' || p.last_name AS player, ROUND(SUM(pgs.points) * 1.0 / (2.0 * (SUM(pgs.fg_attempted) + 0.44 * SUM(pgs.ft_attempted))), 3) AS ts_pct FROM player_game_stats pgs JOIN players p ON pgs.player_id = p.player_id GROUP BY pgs.player_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 10 AND SUM(pgs.fg_attempted) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) >= 5 ORDER BY ts_pct DESC LIMIT 1
